io.scanbot.sdk.ui.view.workflow.camera

Class WorkflowAutoSnappingController.Companion

  • io.scanbot.sdk.ui.view.workflow.camera.WorkflowAutoSnappingController.Companion
  • Enclosing class:
    WorkflowAutoSnappingController

    public static class WorkflowAutoSnappingController.Companion

    • Method Detail

      • attach

        @NotNull
public WorkflowAutoSnappingController attach(@NotNull
                                                      IScanbotCameraView cameraView,
                                                      @NotNull
                                                      WorkflowFrameHandler workflowFrameHandler)

        Convenience method for attaching class WorkflowAutoSnappingController to interface IScanbotCameraView

        Auto-snapping is enabled by default as soon as you create new instance of class WorkflowAutoSnappingController. You can manually enable or disable auto-snapping by setting WorkflowAutoSnappingController.isEnabled.

        Parameters:
        cameraView - cameraView to attach to
        Returns:
        new instance of class WorkflowAutoSnappingController
        See Also:
        class WorkflowAutoSnappingController, interface IScanbotCameraView, class WorkflowAutoSnappingController, detach
